Step.Name: First jQuery Webpage
Step.Des: I create this page to introduce the city Wuhan! I wish this could help people to know more about Wuhan - not just the virus. This page should contain a slideshow, jQuery effect, and a jQuery accordion or tab panel.

Step.Name: Space Sale Webpage
Step.Des: I create this page to sell three space program souvenirs, and all the information is read from an XML database!

Step.Name: Final Proposal Webpage
Step.Des: I created this webpage to define the scope and subject of my final project. I also identified two target groups for my two sites and stated the differences between the two sites.

Step.Name: Progress Tracker Webpage
Step.Des: I created the XML driven progress report for my final project. I will be able to use this kind of webpage to help staying my client and all other stakeholders informed of the progress being made on my project.

Step.Name: Final Project - Site One!
Step.Des: I create two pages to sale the same computer to two different group. The target group of site one are 3D gamers.

Step.Name: Final Project - Site Two!
Step.Des: I create two pages to sale the same computer to two different group. The target group of site one are 3D artists.
